name: kinetic-resource-planning-simulator
description: Simulator for optimizing and analyzing production process chains with resource constraints (TypeScript)

scripts.test:all: ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/ikea 1000 && ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/inception 1000 && ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/pomme 1000 && ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/recre 1000 && ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/simple 1000 && ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/steak 1000
scripts.test:simple: ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/simple 1000 && ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/steak 1000 && ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/ikea 1000
scripts.test:hard: ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/inception 1000 && ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/pomme 1000 && ts-node src/krpsim.ts resources/recre 1000
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.rebuild-full: npm run clean:all && npm install && npm run build
